name: Power of Ten a.k.a. Lego Katamari
name_original: Power of Ten a.k.a. Lego Katamari
description:
You're a Lego brick that desperately wants to see the world. Roll up other bricks, starting small and getting larger as you collect more, until you get large enough to be able to navigate your way out of the window.

This was a project for the Design and Technology major at Parsons School of Design, but if you stumbled on it randomly, I hope you like it!
